name: W11 - Meeting Notes & Action Item Extractor

parameters.content:
## ðŸ“ Meeting Notes & Action Item Extractor

### What this workflow does
1. Watches Google Drive folder for meeting notes
2. Downloads and reads the document
3. Extracts attendees, decisions, and action items
4. Logs summary to Google Sheets
5. Posts formatted summary to Slack with task assignments

### Setup steps
1. Connect Google Drive account (OAuth2)
2. Get PDF Vector API key from pdfvector.com/api-keys
3. Create Google Sheet with columns: Meeting Title, Date, Duration, Attendees, Attendee Count, Decisions Made, Action Items, High Priority, Follow-up Date, Notes Link, Processed
4. Update folder ID and spreadsheet ID in the nodes
5. Connect Slack and select your team channel

### Perfect for
- Project managers tracking action items
- Team leads distributing meeting summaries
- Executive assistants organizing follow-ups

## âœ… Extracted Fields

- Meeting title & date
- Attendees (names, roles, emails)
- Key discussion points
- Decisions made + rationale
- Action items + owners + due dates
- Priority levels (High/Medium/Low)
- Follow-up meeting details
- Parking lot items

## ðŸ“Š Google Sheets Columns

Meeting Title | Date | Duration | Attendees | Attendee Count | Decisions Made | Action Items | High Priority | Follow-up Date | Notes Link | Processed

parameters.prompt: Extract meeting information from these notes or transcript: meeting title, date, attendees, agenda items, key discussion points, decisions made, action items with assigned owners and due dates, and any follow-up meetings scheduled.
